targets.query:
from(bucket: "phisonai")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "n_log" and r["userId"] != "")   
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.serviceId =~ /^${Service:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["userId"], mode: "by")
  |> unique(column:"userId")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: 1}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: sum)
  |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "phisonai")
  |> range(start: -7d, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "n_log" and r["userId"] != "")   
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.serviceId =~ /^${Service:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["userId"], mode: "by")
  |> unique(column:"userId")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: 1}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: sum)
  |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "phisonai")
  |> range(start: -1d, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "n_log" and r["userId"] != "")   
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.serviceId =~ /^${Service:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["userId"], mode: "by")
  |> unique(column:"userId")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: 1}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: sum)
  |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "phisonai")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "n_log" and r["userId"] != "")   
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.serviceId =~ /^${Service:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["userId"], mode: "by")
  |> unique(column:"userId")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: 1}))
  |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["_value"]) 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 20m, fn: count)

from(bucket: "phisonai")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "n_log" and r["flowId"] != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.serviceId =~ /^${Service:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["flowId"], mode: "by")
  |> unique(column:"flowId")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: 1}))
  |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["_value"]) 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 20m, fn: count)

from(bucket: "phisonai")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "n_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.serviceId =~ /^${Service:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.flowId =~ /^${FlowID:regex}$/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "level","errorCode","version", "_value", "callSite","serviceId","ip","flowId","userId"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with t_start: int(v: r._time)/1000000-600000}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with t_end: int(v: r._time)/1000000+600000}))
|> group()

panels.description: Number of tokens processed per second
panels.title: Token Throughput

panels.description: End to end request latency measured in seconds.
panels.title: E2E Request Latency

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

panels.description: Disk space used of all filesystems mounted
panels.title: Disk Space Used Basic

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: "phisonai",
    tag: "serviceId",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "n_log",
    start: v.timeRangeStart,
    stop:v.timeRangeStop
)
list.name: Service
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: "phisonai",
    tag: "serviceId",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "n_log",
    start: v.timeRangeStart,
    stop:v.timeRangeStop
)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "phisonai")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "n_log" and r["flowId"] != "")
  |> group(columns: ["flowId"], mode: "by")
  |> unique(column: "flowId")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({flowId: r.flowId}))
list.label: Flow ID
list.name: FlowID

query.query:
from(bucket: "phisonai")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "n_log" and r["flowId"] != "")
  |> group(columns: ["flowId"], mode: "by")
  |> unique(column: "flowId")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({flowId: r.flowId}))

list.definition:
from(bucket: "phisonai")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "n_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["flowId"] == "${FlowID}")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time"])
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _time: int(v: r._time)/1000000+600000}))
list.label: Time To
list.name: TimeTo

list.definition:
from(bucket: "phisonai")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "n_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["flowId"] == "${FlowID}")
  |> first()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _time: int(v: r._time)/1000000-600000}))
list.label: Time From
list.name: TimeFrom
list.query:
from(bucket: "phisonai")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "n_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["flowId"] == "${FlowID}")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "phisonai")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "n_log" and r["flowId"] != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["level"] == "Error")
  |> group(columns: ["flowId"], mode: "by")
  |> unique(column:"flowId")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: 1}))
  |> sum()
list.label: Error Flow Count
list.name: ErrorFlowCount
